attributes.action: Make it compulsary for High-schools to give non-school uniform days in England.
attributes.additional_details: So thati can show that I've been heard and have a voice in our society
attributes.background: Make High-schools in England have to give a minimum of 4 non-school uniform days to all students in the year 7-11 and for 6 former to be able to wear sports gear on pe days and suites on no pe days

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about whether to have days when students aren't required to wear their uniform are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Ban compulsory school uniforms: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/639304
